nodes.text: Asusto was a small forested planet located within the Tamsis Nebula in the Outer Rim Territories, strong with the dark side of the Force and often visited by smugglers. The last of the Presagers of Hakotei hid on the planet. The Presagers led Jedi Master Lene Kostana and her Padawan Sifo-Dyas into a trap on Asusto by tricking them into following a supposed trail for Sith artifacts from Karazak.
Asusto first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The spelling of Asusto's name was given in the script of the audiobook.
